sentences.en: An exclusive drive for the highest salary deteriorates human relationships.
sentences.cn: 对高工资的过分追求破坏了人与人之间的关系.

sentences.en: As the divergence between control rights and flow fights widens, corporate performance deteriorates.
sentences.cn: 随着两者分离程度的增加, 公司绩效将下降,并体现出递增的边际效应.

sentences.en: In condensation heat transfer process, the presence of non - condensable gas greatly deteriorates the heat transfer efficiency.
sentences.cn: 蒸汽冷凝传热中, 不凝气的存在将导致传热过程的严重恶化,所以研究不凝气对冷凝传热的影响,历来受到重视.

sentences.en: Influenced by interventions mainly coming from human beings , the rel atively dynamic balanced ecosystem deteriorates.
sentences.cn: 相对动态平衡的生态系统,受到以人类为主的干扰而衰退,出现了环境问题.
记忆力随着年龄的增长而逐渐衰退.

sentences.en: Pollen never deteriorates. It is one of the few naturally secreted substances that last indefinitely.
sentences.cn: 花粉永远不会变质,是自然界中少有的几种可以无限期存在的物质之一.

sentences.en: Suggest why natural rubber readily deteriorates on prolonged exposure to air.
sentences.cn: 解释为什么当天然橡胶在空气中延展开来的时候会硬化?

sentences.en: The climbing partner should encourage, as well as give feedback if and when climbing technique deteriorates.
sentences.cn: 攀岩伙伴应该相互鼓励, 同时如果对方技术变形时,应该及时提醒.

sentences.en: The high - temperature ductility deteriorates and intra - granular strength increases with an increases of dynamic precipitation of carbide.
sentences.cn: 结果表明:晶内强度随碳化物动态析出量的增加而上升,高温塑性随之而降低.

sentences.en: Their health rapidly deteriorates and they would die if insulin were not given.
sentences.cn: 他们身体健康会很快垮掉.如果不给胰岛素,他们会死.

sentences.en: Then, what creates the factor which Maya person deteriorates is?
sentences.cn: 那么, 造成玛雅人衰败的因素是什么 呢 ?

sentences.en: There are fears that the situation might deteriorate into full-scale war.
sentences.cn: 人们担心局势会恶化为全面战争。

sentences.en: Too often the significant episode deteriorates into sententious conversation.
sentences.cn: 太多的时候,重要的插话演变成了一种说教式的对话.

sentences.en: With the increase of the nominal maximum aggregate size, the homogeneity of the asphalt mixture deteriorates.
sentences.cn: 随着公称最大集料粒径的增大, 沥青混合料均匀性变差.

trans.tran_cn: 恶化，变坏( deteriorate的第三人称单数 )
trans.tran_en: If something deteriorates, it becomes worse in some way
